game.name: Mimic in the Dungeon
game.shortDescription: You are the Tentacle Mimic! Defend your dungeon from female intruders seeking to steal your treasures. Capture the intruders and bring them to the dungeon to harness their energy and grow stronger.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are the Tentacle Mimic! Defend your dungeon from female intruders seeking to steal your treasures. Capture the intruders and bring them to the dungeon to harness their energy and grow stronger.
